column1:
Deeply saddened to hear about the passing of Dr. Li Wenliang to the novel coronavirus. Rest in peace.

"He who holds the firewood for the masses, is the one who freezes to death in wind and snow."

https://www.washingtonpost.com/world/asia_pacific/chinese-doctor-who-tried-to-raise-alarm-on-coronavirus-in-wuhan-dies-from-disease/2020/02/06/8bf305a2-48f9-11ea-8a1f-de1597be6cbc_story.html#comments-wrapper …
